description.short: Bright and fruity with a hint of berry and lemon
description.long: The Ethiopian Yirgacheffe coffee is known for its bright and fruity flavor with a hint of berry and lemon. It is grown in the southern regions of Ethiopia and is known for its unique and complex flavor profile. This coffee is typically medium roasted to bring out its full potential.

description.short: Smooth and well-balanced with a nutty finish
description.long: Colombian Supremo is a well-known and popular coffee. It is grown in the Colombian Andes mountains and is known for its smooth and well-balanced flavor with a nutty finish. The coffee is light roasted to preserve its natural sweetness and delicate flavor notes.

description.short: Full-bodied with a bold and fruity flavor
description.long: Kenyan AA is a high-quality coffee grown in the high elevations of Kenya. It is known for its full-bodied and bold flavor with a fruity taste. The coffee is medium roasted to bring out its rich and complex flavor profile. It is a popular choice among coffee connoisseurs.

description.short: Smooth and earthy with a hint of spice
description.long: Sumatra Mandheling is a smooth and earthy coffee grown in the Sumatra region of Indonesia. It has a hint of spice and is known for its low acidity. The coffee is dark roasted to bring out its rich and full-bodied flavor. It is a popular choice for coffee lovers who prefer a bolder taste.

description.short: Smooth and nutty with a hint of caramel
description.long: Brazilian Santos is a smooth and nutty coffee grown in the Santos region of Brazil. It has a hint of caramel and is known for its low acidity. The coffee is medium roasted to bring out its rich and full-bodied flavor. It is a popular choice for coffee lovers who prefer a milder taste.

description.short: Full-bodied with a hint of chocolate and nut
description.long: Guatemalan Antigua is a full-bodied coffee grown in the Antigua region of Guatemala. It has a hint of chocolate and nut and is known for its rich and complex flavor profile. The coffee is medium roasted to bring out its full potential. It is a popular choice among coffee connoisseurs.

description.short: Smooth and balanced with a hint of citrus
description.long: Colombian Supremo is a smooth and balanced coffee grown in the Colombia. It has a hint of citrus and is known for its medium body and bright acidity. The coffee is medium roasted to bring out its rich and complex flavor profile. It is a popular choice among coffee lovers who prefer a well-rounded taste.

description.short: Fruity and floral notes with a clean finish
description.long: Peruvian Pangoa is a light roast coffee grown in the high-altitude region of Pangoa, Peru. It has a fruity and floral notes with a clean finish. The coffee is known for its delicate body and bright acidity. It is a popular choice among coffee lovers who prefer a light-bodied coffee with a clean finish.

description.short: Complex with bright acidity and floral aroma
description.long: Ethiopian Sidamo is a medium roast coffee grown in the Yirgacheffe region of Ethiopia. It is known for its complex flavor profile, bright acidity and floral aroma. The coffee has a medium body and a clean finish. It is a popular choice among coffee lovers who appreciate the unique and complex flavor notes of Ethiopian coffee.

description.short: Full bodied with a bold and fruity flavor
description.long: Kenyan SL-34 is a medium-dark roast coffee grown in the Kenya. It is known for its full bodied and bold flavor, with fruity undertones. The coffee has a bright acidity and a clean finish. It is a popular choice among coffee lovers who appreciate the unique and complex flavor notes of Kenyan coffee.

description.short: Dark roast blend with rich aroma and nutty flavors
description.long: Espresso Blend is a dark roast coffee blend of Colombian and Brazilian beans. The blend is known for its rich aroma, nutty flavors and full body. The coffee has a low acidity and a smooth finish. It is a popular choice among coffee lovers who appreciate the unique and complex flavor notes of dark roast blend.

description.short: Africa Blend with fruity and floral aroma
description.long: Africa Blend is a medium roast coffee blend of Ethiopia and Kenyan beans. The blend is known for its fruity and floral aroma, with a bright acidity and a clean finish. It is a popular choice among coffee lovers who appreciate the unique and complex flavor notes of African coffee.

description.short: Guatemalan Huehuetenango with chocolate and nutty notes
description.long: Guatemalan Huehuetenango is a medium roast coffee grown in the Huehuetenango region of Guatemala. Known for its chocolate and nutty notes, this coffee has a moderate acidity and a smooth finish. It is a popular choice among coffee lovers who appreciate the unique and complex flavor notes of Guatemalan coffee.

description.short: Sumatra Mandheling with earthy and herbal notes
description.long: Sumatra Mandheling is a dark roast coffee grown in the Mandheling region of Sumatra, Indonesia. Known for its earthy and herbal notes, this coffee has a low acidity and a heavy body. It is a popular choice among coffee lovers who appreciate the unique and complex flavor notes of Indonesian coffee.
